nodes.text: Predict Natural Disaster was a Force power in the Sense family of abilities. A Jedi could use the Force to sense changes in meteorological and geological conditions to predict disasters such as groundquakes, volcanic activity, floods, and storms among others.

The degree to which the Jedi could predict the disaster depended on several factors, including the amount of time they has spent in the locality, familiarity with topography and weather patterns, and the severity of the disaster.
